name: Lost Cuirassier
description:
Play as a lone knight and fend off hordes of skeletons with your trusty brace of flintlock pistols.

A small arcade shooter.

Instructions:

  • WASD = Movement
  • Mouse = Aim
  • Left Mouse Button = Shoot
  • R = Reload
  • ESC = Quit to menu
  • Your pistols reload one at a time
  • You reload faster while standing still
